entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -21.7°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm near Kamloops. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
